text: allaah hee kheenchata hai praanon ko, unake maran ke samay tatha jisake maran ka samay nahin aaya, usakee nidra mein. phir rok leta hai jisapar nirnay kar diya ho maran ka tatha bhej deta hai any ko, ek nirdhaarit samay tak ke lie. vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain unake lie, jo manan-chintan[1] karate hon
